pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-4571] Show PHP Static Analysis configuration files in Important Files
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-4571
Added standard configuration files of PHP static analysis tools to Important Files.

nodes.bodyText:

cc: @tmysik
